name: Ocean Explorer (EdSpaged)
description:
Ocean Explorer is a 2D Shoot 'Em up inspired by classic arcade games. Explore the Ocean and defeat the Kraken!

Features:

  • Challenging Shoot-em-up Gameplay!
  • Realistic Submarine Physics!
  • Ways to upgrade and customize your ship to your playstyle!
  • Awesome 2.5 Graphics!

Created by a team of students from Marist College as part of the Game Studio course - Fall 2019

Producer - Ian Clayman

Co-Producer - Liam Ollive

Programmers

  • Ed Marrs-Lead
  • John Monzo
  • Kevin Costello
  • Kyle Berkowitz
  • Preston DeMarco
